page.title: 11MUSICAL YOUTH
page.content: I DID A SURVEY ON MUSIC WITH ALL THE FIRST YEAR PUPILS, WHO ARE 12 YEARS OLD. THESE ARE THE RESULTS, FROM ABOUT 100 PUPILS. 27 PUPILS SAID THAT THEY PLAY A MUSICAL INSTRUMENT 9 PUPILS PLAY A{WOODWIND INSTRUMENT 3 PUPILS PLAY A{BRASS INTRUMENT 4 PUPILS PLAY A{PERCUSSION INSTRUMENT 9 PUPILS PLAY A{STRINGED INSTRUMENT 100 PUPILS LISTEN TO{"POP"}MUSIC 10 PUPILS SING IN A CHOIR 55 PUPILS SING IN THE HOME THERE ARE NOT MANY PUPILS THAT PLAY INSTRUMENTS, BUT THERE ARE LOTS OF PUPILS THAT LISTEN TO MUSIC. NOT MANY PUPILS SING IN THE CHOIR, BUT LOTS OF PUPILS SING IN THE HOME. MUSICAL YOUTH IS A WELL KNOWN {POP } GROUP.
